result.execSummary:
The defendant Randy Lee Goodiel was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Sentence w/held probation 1 year - costs - restitution hearing to be set where victim (kimberly Cardoso) is to represent themselves and state is not involved - any counseling DOC may recommend

miscConds.notes: $243.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Kevin Schmidt in court.  No other parties or victims appear.   No restitution was previously ordered and no requests for restitution have been made.  
No restitution ordered in this case.  Court states JOC does not need to be amended.

Defendant Randy Lee Goodiel in court with attorney Kevin Schmidt.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State recites agreement 1 year probation - restitution to be determined (hearing to be set) - Atty Schmidt agrees.  DE entered plea of NC.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  Court finds DE guilty.

COURT:  Sentence w/held probation 1 year - costs - restitution hearing to be set where victim (kimberly Cardoso) is to represent themselves and state is not involved - any counseling DOC may recommend  Restitution hearing scheduled for March 21, 2017 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Randy Lee Goodiel in court with attorney Kevin Schmidt.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Schmidt asks for status conference. Reset.  Scheduling conference scheduled for January 31, 2017 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Randy Lee Goodiel in court with attorney Kevin Schmidt.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Schmidt requests 2 to 3 weeks for another status.  Status conference scheduled for December 6, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Randy Lee Goodiel in court with attorney Kevin Schmidt.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEF has not had initial.  Initial appearance scheduled for November 1, 2016 at 11:00 am.
No Contact with Travis Persson, Joanna Gage, and Kimberly Cardoso

Defendant Randy Lee Goodiel in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Warrant quashed.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.      Court enters NG Plea.   SIBS $1000  No Contact with Travis Persson, Joanna Gage, Kimberly Cardoso  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 30, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Defendant Randy Lee Goodiel not in court.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State requests a warrant.   Court grants request, warrant authorized.
